intro: Join Lia, Sofi, and Tomás in the Sweetness Rebellion and bring joy back to a candy-free city with the help of a magical sugar fairy!
description:
The Sweetness Rebellion has begun! 

Join Lia, Sofi, and Tomás on a magical adventure where candy has incredible powers!

Meet Glimmer, the Sugar Plum Fairy, and learn that sweetness can save the world.

Use candies that make you float, speak in a robotic voice, or turn you invisible.

Bring color and laughter back to a gray city where sweetness has been banned.

Take on the grumpy Mayor Grimthorne and his bumbling assistant, Mr. Grumbles.

Celebrate the Festival of Flavors where all tastes—sweet, salty, and bitter—live in harmony.

Laugh, imagine, and discover that a little bit of sweetness can change everything!
